titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to lease portions of the Airborne and Special Operations Museum facility to the Airborne and Special Operations Museum Foundation to support operation of the Museum.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 3/16/2010--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to lease portions of the Airborne and Special Operations Museum facility to the Airborne and Special Operations Museum Foundation for generating revenue for Museum activities and to support Museum operations.
